title: Deputies: 2-year-old shot near St. Cloud remains in critical condition
content:
A 2-year-old boy remains in critical condition this morning after he apparently shot himself on accident Monday evening, according to the Osceola County Sheriff's Office.
Emergency medical crews flew the boy to Arnold Palmer Hospital, where he remained overnight.
Deputies say it appears the boy accidentally shot himself with a small caliber gun at a home near St. Cloud.
It happened a little after 6 p.m. in the 2900 block of Michigan Avenue, according to the Sheriff's Office.
Detectives say evidence suggests the boy accidentally shot himself, but the incident is still under investigation.
No other details were available.
This is a breaking news story. Check back later for updates.
